channel.title: Entertainment News, Latest Entertainment News, Hollywood Bollywood News | Entertainment - Times of India
channel.description: Latest entertainment news and gossip from the world of bollywood, Hollywood and television.

image.title: Entertainment News, Latest Entertainment News, Hollywood Bollywood News | Entertainment - Times of India

item.title: Sex for a cause: Ranveer Singh to endorse condoms
item.description: Just couple of days we had made a list of actors who should endorse condoms to spread the social message of 'prevention is better than cure'. However, now our wishlist has turned reality as one of our top contenders Ranveer Singh has actually been signed on to endorse a leading condom brand.

item.title: Sex for a cause: Ranveer Singh to endorse condoms
item.description: Just couple of days we had made a list of actors who should endorse condoms to spread the social message of 'prevention is better than cure'. However, now our wishlist has turned reality as one of our top contenders Ranveer Singh has actually been signed on to endorse a leading condom brand.

item.title: What do Priyanka, Hrithik have in common?
item.description: Priyanka Chopra is rumoured to have a new agency representing her, especially for commercial endorsements. She apparently chose this team because she was advised to do so by a superstar.

item.title: Mehr leans heavily towards religion
item.description: Model and star-wife Mehr Jessia Rampal seems to be leaning heavily towards religion, say sources.

item.title: Delhi Police welcomes Hrithik and Katrina
item.description: Delhi Police recently played host to the actors during the shoot of their upcoming film, adding to the city’s USPs as a shooting destination

item.title: Aaradhya Bachchan to get her own personal space
item.description: The Bachchans acquired their fifth bungalow in Juhu sometime ago. It’s exactly behind their current residence, Jalsa. We hear from sources that the family has plans to make a lawn in the newly acquired space.

item.title: Aaradhya Bachchan to get her own personal space

item.title: 'Sex is one thing that is totally recession free'
item.description: There is a lot of buzz surrounding Sunny Leone, but this sexy star is much more than what meets the eye.

item.title: Neetu Chandra excited about debut on international stage
item.description: Neetu Chandra, who made her theatrical debut with Umrao — as the title character, courtesan Umrao Jaan — is looking forward to performing in Dubai, which will mark her first stint on an international stage.

item.title: 'Bollywood is full of biggest cowards in the world'
item.description: Actor, producer, director Kamaal R Khan of Bigg Boss and Desh Drohi fame doesn’t believe in mincing his words, even when he’s ready to don a politician’s cap and fight the forthcoming Lok Sabha elections.

item.title: SLB, Karan fight over Ranveer-Deepika
item.description: The trade maintains that the ‘much-attracted-to-each-other’ couple Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone are still to sign on the dotted line for Shuddhi.

item.title: PICS: Madonna shows off hairy armpits
item.description: Madonna has flaunted a sexy black bra and hairy armpits in a post on Instagram, which she captioned ''Long hair... Don't Care.''
